about_the_game:
Suzunone Miu and Rinto will perform a live show in "Live Action-BIT THEATER"! Topping off the live show with energetic voices and sounds assigned to the buttons will make the live show even more fun!

There are 10 types of voices, 2 types of loop sounds and 2 types of one-shot sounds available for topping. Enjoy a free live show without set timing or musical scores!!

● Features of "Live Action-BIT THEATER"

◆ Bright and energetic "ROUTE 46"
Suzunone Miu and Rinto sing "ROUTE 46", the ending song of the Nintendo Switch software "Twin Rabbits Neighborhood Tourism". It is an exquisite chiptune arranged by Iwadare Noriyuki (Iwadare Music Studio Co., Ltd.), who has composed numerous game music.
If you meet the conditions, you may unlock newly arranged solo versions of Miu and Rinto!

◆Mini-game "SHORT SHORTs"
After enjoying the live performance, enjoy the mini-game "SHORT SHORTs"! Mini-games that start and end quickly, such as "SWEETS FACTORY" where Miu stuffs her stomach with her favorite sweets, and "FASTEST LAP" where you measure the lap time of the race in which Rinto participates, are included. Try it repeatedly to complete all 5 mini-games!

◆Production staff
Developed by Pixel Inc., which develops and sells "Horgi Hugh with Friends" and "Enryuu Seiken Xiaomei". The director is Mr. Hidekuni Sasaki of the same company. The music is handled by Noriyuki Iwadare, who has many representative works such as "Grandia" and "Ace Attorney series", and also arranges orchestras and performs band live.
